title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
**Unleash the Ultimate Fun with the TOSY Flying Disc!**

Celebrate the joy of flying discs with a twist of modern technology and vibrant colors! The TOSY Flying Disc is not just a game piece; it’s a glowing masterpiece designed to light up any night sky, home party, or camping adventure. With its stunning 16 million color RGB or 360 LED options, this flying disc is 100 times brighter than any other light-up disc, ensuring you never miss a moment of fun.

**Smart Features You Need to Know:**
- **Auto Light Up:** Motion sensors detect your movements and automatically light up the disc for those surprise catches in the dark.
- **Smart Modes:** Switch between various modes including brightness levels and timer modes to customize your playtime.
- **High Durability:** Water-resistant and highly durable construction ensures the disc can withstand the elements and frequent use.
- **Rechargeable:** Charge in just 30 minutes for up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match, thanks to its USB Type C to C charging cable.

**Perfect for Every Occasion:**
- **Glow in the Dark Night Play:** Whether it’s a Christmas gathering, birthday bash, or a camping trip, the TOSY Flying Disc is the perfect light-up companion.
- **Freestyle Tricks:** Impress friends and family with professional-level freestyle tricks at the touch of a button.
- **Disc Games:** Play classic games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes with precision and style.

**Why Choose the TOSY Flying Disc?**
- **Professional Standards:** Made to meet the highest standards for flying discs, ensuring consistent performance and longevity.
- **Comfort and Control:** The lightweight 175 grams design ensures a comfortable grip and precise throws.

This isn’t just a toy—it’s a game-changer. Give the TOSY Flying Disc to your loved ones or upgrade your own collection today and experience the future of flying disc fun!

**Available Now:** Order yours and get ready to glow with excitement!
